award_name.ja: 有機合成化学協会研究企画賞

paper_title.en: Palladium(II)-Catalyzed cyclization of urethanes and total synthesis of 1-deoxymannojirimycin

description.en:
[GRAPHICS]
The palladium(II)-catalyzed cyclization of the urethane 8, which was derived from D-mannitol, gave the cyclic compound 9 with excellent diastereoselectivity. During these transformations, the Pd(II) species are not reduced and thus the catalyst can recycle without its reoxidation, The cycloadduct 9 was converted to 1-deoxymannojirimycin.

paper_title.en: A new preparation of 2,5-dihydro-1-benzoxepins using Mitsunobu cyclization, and the synthesis of natural radulanins

description.en: Mitsunobu cyclization of o-[4-hydroxy-3-methyl-2(Z)-butenyl]pheno 2a effected selective seven-membered cyclization to give 3-methyl-2,5-dihydro-1-benoxepin la. Using this procedure, natural radulanin A and radulanin A methyl ether were synthesized effectively. (C) 2000 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Stereoselective alkynylation of trans-2,3-epoxy sulfides with double inversion of configuration by alkynylaluminums

description.en: A stereoselective alkynylation reaction of trans-1-phenylthio-2,3-epoxyalkanes with alkynylaluminums which proceeds via episulfonium ions, that is, with double inversion of con figuration, has been developed. (C) 1999 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: The C-2 selective azide opening reaction of trans-2,3-epoxy alcohols by NaN3 and PhB(OH)(2)

description.en: The azide opening reaction of trans-2,3-epoxy alcohols with NaN3 and PhB(OH)(2) in DMF occurred regio- and stereoselectively at the C-2 position giving rise to phenylboronates of trans-2-azido-1,3-diols in high yields. (C) 1999 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Stereoselective Synthesis of the Chiral Tetrahydropyrane Core of Swinholides and Misakinolides.
Total synthesis of NPTX-5 and NPTX-6, Joro spider (Nephila clavata) toxins having a unique putreanine trimer and putreanine tetramer acylpolyamine chain

description.en: The first total synthesis of NPTX-5 and NPTX-6, Joro spider (Nephila clavata) toxins having a 4-hydroxyindole nucleus and a unique putreanine trimer and tetramer acylpolyamine chain, respectively, has been achieved by the iterative use of a key azide compound. (C) 1998 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Highly stereoselective epoxidation of a 4-methyl-5-(triethylsilyl)oxyallyl alcohol system with m-chloroperoxybenzoic acid

description.en: Epoxidation of 4-methyl-5-(triethylsilyl)oxyallyl alcohol system with m-chloroperoxybenzoic acid (MCPBA) has been found to occur highly stereoselectively and in high yields from the opposite side of the C-5 triethylsilyloxy group regardless of the stereochemistry of an adjacent methyl group. (C) 1998 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Efficient and stereospecific construction of asymmetric quaternary carbons via gamma-alkyl-gamma,delta-epoxy acrylates

description.en: Highly efficient and stereospecific construction of asymmetric quaternary carbons via the alkylation of gamma-alkyl-gamma,delta-epoxy acrylates with (CH3)(3)Al is described. (C) 1998 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Expeditious and Stereoselective Synthesis of Chiral trans-β-Hydeoxy-δ-lactone Systems.
Total synthesis of nephilatoxin-1 (NPTX-1), a Joro spider (Nephila clavata) toxin having a 4-hydroxyindole nucleus

description.en: The first total synthesis of Nephilatoxin-1 (NPTX-1), a Joro spider (Nephila clavata) toxin having a 4-hydroxyindole nucleus, has been achieved by using two key azide intermediates. (C) 1997 Elsevier Science Ltd.

paper_title.en: Stereospecific internal alkylation of terminal gamma,delta-epoxy acrylates

description.en: The alkylation of ethyl (S)- and (R)-4,5-epoxy-2-pentenoates (11) and (12), chiral terminal gamma,delta-epoxy acrylates prepared from D-mannitol, by trialkylaluminum in the presence of water occurs regioselectively at the gamma position, i.e., at the internal position, to yield a sole product respectively with net inversion of configuration. The method provides useful chiral synthons for natural product synthesis. (C) 1997 Elsevier Science Ltd.

paper_title.en: Synthesis of the C-8-C-15 segment of (+)-discodermolide

description.en: Succeeding to the preceding paper, stereoselective synthesis of the C-8-C-15 segment of (+)-discodermolide (1), the marine natural product having the potent immunosuppressive activity, is described in which the contiguous asymmetric centers at C-11 and C-12 positions were stereospecifically constructed via the methylation of an epoxy alcohol with lithium dimethylcuprate.

paper_title.en: Stereoselective synthesis of the C-1-C-7 segment of (+)-discodermolide

description.en: A new and highly stereoselective synthesis of the C-1-C-7 segment of (+)-discodermolide, the marine natural product having the potent immunosuppressive activity, is described in which the stereospecific methylation of gamma,delta-epoxy acrylate with trimethylaluminum and the intramolecular conjugate addition of an acetal alkoxide anion are involved as key steps.

paper_title.en: NEW DEVELOPMENT IN SYNTHESES OF PROSTAGLANDIN SKELETON

description.en: Four synthetic approaches to the primary PGs and its Stork's intermediate, and two approaches to the carbacyclin and its isocarbacyclin analogue are presented. In the first approach, PGE, was synthesized by the con jugate addition of vinylzincates to 2-cyclopentenones. In the second approach, the Stork's intermediate was synthesized by the [2,3]-Wittig rearrangement. In the third approach, the 11-deoxy-Stork's intermediate was synthesized by the Pd(0)-catalyzed cyclization containing 1,3-chirality transfer. In the fourth approach, PGE(2) was synthesized by the enone-switching reaction of the beta-alkoxy-alpha-methylene cyclopentanone. The carbacyclin and its isocarbacyclin skeleton were synthesized by the Claisen rearrangement and Diels-Alder reaction, respectively, and those stereoselectivities were examined based on MM 2 transition model.

publication_name.en: JOURNAL OF SYNTHETIC ORGANIC CHEMISTRY JAPAN

paper_title.en: CHIRALITY TRANSFER IN PALLADIUM-CATALYZED REACTIONS OF ALLYLAMMONIUM SALTS

description.en: Optically active 1-isobutyl-2(Z)-butenyltrimethylammonium iodide (10) underwent allylation with dimethyl sodiomalonate in the presence of a palladium(0) catalyst. The reaction proceeded predominantly with 1,3 transposition and with inversion of configuration due probably to a prior isomerization from anti to syn-pi-allylpalladium intermediate (14-->15). The stereochemistry observed in the reaction with phenylzinc chloride was opposite to that with the soft nucleophile.

paper_title.ja: プロスタグランジン骨格合成の新展開

paper_title.en: A NEW APPROACH TO CARBACYCLIN BY USING CLAISEN REARRANGEMENT OF CYCLIC ORTHOESTER

description.en: New synthetic approach to a chiral carbacyclin by using Claisen rearrangement of cyclic orthoester and its diastereoselectivity based on MM2 transition state model are described.

paper_title.en: CHIRALITY TRANSFER IN THE PALLADIUM(0)-CATALYZED CYCLIZATION OF 3-OXO-8,9-DIHYDROXYTETRADECA-1,6-DIENE DERIVATIVES INTO 2-METHYLENECYCLOPENTANONES

description.en: Pd(O)-catalyzed cyclizations of four diastereomeric 3-oxo-8,9-dihydroxytetradeca-1,6-diene derivatives were carried out to give 2-methylenecyclopentanones with stereospecific 1,3-chirality transfer in up to 95% overall inversion of stereochemistry, one of which contains a correct pi-side chain to be the Stork's intermediate for prostaglandins.

paper_title.en: A NOVEL PALLADIUM(0)-CATALYZED CYCLIZATION OF 2,7-OCTADIENYL CARBONATE CONTAINING AN ALLYLSILANE MOIETY

description.en: Palladium(0)-catalyzed reaction of a 2,7-octadienyl carbonate that contains a highly nucleophilic allylsilane moiety affords a new mode of cyclization to give selectively a cyclohexane framework.

paper_title.en: Palladium-Catalyzed Aminocarbonylation of Cinnamyl ┣DBN, N(/)-┫DB-Dialkylcarbamates. An Intriguing Crossover with p-Methylcinnamylamines.

research_project_title.ja: 水溶液中での不斉反応の開発
パラジウム触媒を用いた立体選択的環化反応の開発
